title: Intermediate Course on Culturally Inclusive Language Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Blended environment combining smartphone-based synchronous online lectures and offline workshops. Focuses on analyzing real-world cases applying cultural inclusivity in language education

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more culturally biased elements embedded in language education materials
Learners can develop one or more cultural inclusivity checklists referencing AECT ethical standards
Learners can design language activities that reflect the cultural background of the target learner group.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
